name: P28
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. An unfamiliar person in casual clothing. They walk confidently to the door and try the handle as if they expect it to be unlocked. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
